0.LABEL: Contacts
0.SUB_LABEL_1: You can contact me using the following methods:

1.LABEL: Summary
1.TEXT:
Detail-oriented, organized employee who works at a fast pace to meet tight deadlines and contribute to the company's success.

Commenced a career in programming in 2020 at Deutsche Telekom, where employment continues to this day. Initially primarily involved in backend development, interests gradually shifted towards frontend development.

Citizen of Russia with residency status in Greece. Contemplating relocation to Canada.

2.LABEL: Biography
2.TEXT:
I was born and raised in Russia, but since 2022, I have been living in Greece. I hold Russian citizenship, as well as residence and work permits in Greece.

I earned bachelor's and master's degrees in law. I began my professional career as a lawyer, holding various positions such as lead legal counsel, chief legal officer, deputy head of the legal department, and also engaged in private practice.

In 2019-2020, I underwent retraining and started working as a programmer in companies under the Deutsche Telekom brand.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.ADDITIONAL: * Preselected skills seem to be the most important to me.
SKILLS.SOFT_HTML:
Persistence and Continuous Learning: Striving continually for self-improvement and staying updated on the latest programming trends through learning new technologies, effective task-solving and valuable project contributions are facilitated.

Precision and Attention to Detail: With keen attention to detail, clean and efficient code is crafted error-free, ensuring high-quality software and minimizing potential development issues.

Independence and Accountability: Effective project work, whether independent or within a team, is supported by independence and accountability. Rapid adaptation to new tasks and project requirements is driven by a commitment to self-improvement.

Effective Problem-Solving: Possessing strong analytical and problem-solving skills enables quick and efficient identification of optimal solutions, even in the most challenging situations. Swift adaptation to new tasks and project requirements is facilitated by independent learning of new technologies.

Efficient Time Management: Mastery of time management allows for efficient task organization and meeting deadlines. Productivity and high performance in work are achieved through effective planning and task prioritization.

Languages: Russian (Native), English (B2), French (A1).

MAIN_DUTIES.1: Creating a notebook web application from scratch.
MAIN_DUTIES.2: Developing a project for renting parking spaces from scratch.

PROJECT.NAME: T-Vacations, T-Plan
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: T-Vacations helps company employees in interacting with the HR department and managers on a number of issues related to taking vacations, paying for sports activities, as well as maintaining timesheets, notifications and reminders for responsible employees. The purpose of T-Plan is to improve efficiency of work with financial prognoses and reports at T-Systems RUS.

MAIN_DUTIES.1: Developing new/rewriting existing features (web services) on backend and on frontend.

PROJECT.NAME: UIS
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Developing UIS (Umwelt-Informations-System, or Environmental Information System). UIS is a system for recording environmental information for a well-known international automobile concern.

MAIN_DUTIES.1: Participating in the development of solutions for implementing complex business logic within the application and its components (such as multi-level questionnaires, reports, managing them at various levels, and administering these processes).
MAIN_DUTIES.2: Developing user interfaces (from design development to implementation).
MAIN_DUTIES.3: Participating in the development of the backend (writing the necessary endpoints, service logic, database queries, creating or editing entities, database migrations).
MAIN_DUTIES.4: Writing tasks in Jira, writing documentation in Confluence.

MAIN_TECH.FE: Angular 9-13 (HTML, CSS, Typescript), PrimeNG, Angular Material.

PROJECT.NAME: AFAB
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: AFAB (Applications for automotive business), the customer is an international automobile concern. These apps provide order management for commercial vehicles, used in all parts of the world where trucks and buses of this concern can be ordered.

MAIN_DUTIES.1: Developing complex multi-level user interfaces for creating, modifying, and managing orders.
MAIN_DUTIES.2: Modifying existing interfaces according to customer requirements.
MAIN_DUTIES.3: Bug fixing, working closely with testers and other developers.
MAIN_DUTIES.4: Assisting novice developers (code review, assistance in solving complex problems).

0.TITLE: HTML, CSS, and Javascript for Web Developers

7.TITLE: Modern technologies for the development and design of graphical applications
